transcript.title: TRANSCRIPT OF THE PRIME MINISTER THE HON JOHN HOWARD MP DOORSTOP INTERVIEW, COOLUM
transcript.content:
Subjects: CHOGM

E&OE...........

JOURNALIST:

Mr Howard, looking forward to tomorrow?

PRIME MINISTER:

Yes I am. I think the arrangements are very good and I';m sure that people from all around the world will enjoy Australian and specifically Queensland hospitality. So I think it';s going to be a great conference and a great opportunity for us to showcase our country.

[Ends]
